casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Rosso, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Rosso v. Indus. Comm. (2000), 88 Ohio St.3d 230.]

*231(No. 99-1150 Submitted February 8, 2000 Decided March 22, 2000.) Shapiro, Kendis & Associates Co., L.P.A., and Rachel B. Jaffy, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Cecille Caluya Harris, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission of Ohio. Thompson, Hiñe & Flory, L.L.P., and J. Kent Breslin, for appellee Geon Company, f.k.a. B.F. Goodrich Company.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
